37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jundab bin 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Whoever fights for a cause that is not clear, advocating tribalism, getting angry for the sake of tribalism, then he has died a death of Jahiliyyah

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِيمَنْ قَاتَلَ تَحْتَ رَايَةٍ عُمِّيَّةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Seriousness of Fighting for a Cause that is Not Clear
